DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Radiation-Induced Dermatitis Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to a cutaneous inflammatory reaction occurring as a result of exposure to biologically effective levels of ionizing radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Radiation-Induced Dermatitis Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a cutaneous inflammatory reaction occurring as a result of exposure to biologically effective levels of ionizing radiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: A cutaneous inflammatory reaction occurring as a result of exposure to biologically effective levels of ionizing radiation.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A cutaneous inflammatory reaction occurring as a result of exposure to biologically effective levels of ionizing radiation.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
